reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and well-made, appreciating its soft material and good value for money. They like its versatility, with one customer noting it can be worn multiple ways with different outfits. The size and fit receive mixed feedback - while some find it perfect for petite ladies, others mention it runs a bit big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: So cute and soft, very cozy for winter. True to size and color (white with black bows). Perfect for that holiday party! Read more
items.author: Amy Leatherman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As expected well made medium heavy weight
items.body: Tightly woven fits as expected and as it should, be loose. Drapes as it should. It's a sweater cut like a cropped jacket, so a little weird, but also just what I needed. I actually took off the knit straps that tie as bows because the white would not match the skirts I plan on wearing this with, but they are cute, no frayed edges and none expected, pics above, well seen into place. It's to go over other shirts, as such, did not experience any itching or scratching in the try on. I do have sensitive skin. The black is truly a deep neutral black, even though it looks gray in my pic. That's just the effect of my particular lamp and the camera (the lamp washes everything out) Read more
items.author: Heather Murray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well-made sweater
items.body: This is a well-made sweater. I needed a blue sweater to go with my blue boots. This will match perfectly. I love how it looks. I love the feel. I’m a size small. I weigh 130 pounds and the size small fits. Perfect I might go back and get another color when it goes on sale Read more
items.author: Annette Lanzisera

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and soft material!
items.body: I really like this cardigan. It is really cute and the material is soft. My only complaint is when you tie the bows in the front they don’t close the center very well so you have to wear something underneath (unlike the picture shows). If you want the relaxed look and for the it to tie closed in the front I recommend going up a size. Maybe that would help the issue I am having. Overall, I do really like this cardigan. It’s super cute dressed down with jeans or dressed up with a skirt. Read more
items.author: Travis Corbett

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big
items.body: Cute and decent quality. It runs a bit big so size down if you don’t want a frumpy look. Read more
items.author: Heather Natalie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: Soft, durable, classy, washes nicely. I received tons of compliments. Love this top. Color was beautiful. Read more
items.author: Angela Darrah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: My 22 year old daughter wore it backwards with a black skirt and it was so cute! 5’1 100lbs. Definitely worth it for the fall. Color blue Read more
items.author: Sdimop

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Great quality. True to size, perfect for petite ladies too! Steam to make the cables pop up after shrink packaging. Read more
items.author: Stephanie B

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
